name: Blue Cross of India
briefDescription: We are one of Indiaâ€™s largest Animal Welfare Organizations and one of the oldest running on private and public donations. We have 3 facilities in and around Chennai which include 2 Hospitals and Shelters and one shelter. We are equipped with 6 working ambulances, 8 doctors and 4 drivers and over 40 animal care givers who operate round the clock services for the treatment of animals. We also are driven by a group of passionate individuals who devote their time purely on an honorary voluntary basis towards running the organization and have a large base of dedicated volunteers and a phenomenal volunteer led Humane Education team. In addition to the above we are equipped with a one of its kind Humane Education Center.
